changelog.en:
# Test Version T0.9.4

## New

- New login page

## Fixed

- Incorrect current values sent to the inverter for currents > 327 A
- Wrong default values
- Pylontech battery capacity
- Slow discharge-current ramp-up after a restart

## Please review (and reset if needed)

- Battery pack settings → Capacity
- Relay outputs → Invert
- Data device mapping → Interface
- Data device mapping → Address

Important: The display must be updated to version ≥ 1.0.5 for this release, otherwise readings will be incorrect!

Firmware mapping:

Original BSC hardware: firmware_xx_xx.bin
Lilygo T-CONNECT - Flashing via USB: firmware_tconnect_full_xx_xx.bin
Lilygo T-CONNECT - Update via OTA: firmware_tconnect_ota_xx_xx.bin
